description: Source files for the AppGateway plugin of the WPEFramework. Contains implementation of classes and methods related to the Plugin_AppGateway module, including core logic, responders, and resolver.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class handling the core functionalities of the AppGateway plugin.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation details for the AppGateway, handling specific behaviors and integrations.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Handles response mechanisms within the AppGateway plugin environment.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Provides resolution services required by the plugin, likely for dynamic component linking.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Defines the module structure and initialization routines for the plugin.

methods.name: AppGateway::initialize
methods.description: Initializes the AppGateway plugin, setting up necessary components.

methods.name: AppGatewayImplementation::performAction
methods.description: Performs specific actions as part of the plugin's operation.

methods.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation::respond
methods.description: Handles response logic for incoming requests.

methods.name: Module::register
methods.description: Registers the plugin module with the framework.
